instruction: Create a recipe to make your own bread.
output: Homemade Sourdough Bread: In a large bowl, mix together 3 cups of all-purpose flour, 3/4 cup of sourdough starter, 1 1/2 cups of warm water, and 1 teaspoon of salt. Knead the mixture until it forms a smooth dough. Grease a baking sheet and roll the dough into a log shape, then place it on the baking sheet. Cover with a damp towel and let it rise for two hours. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit. Bake for 40 minutes, then cool for 20 minutes before slicing. Enjoy!
